name: robits
description:
--PLEASE GIVE IT A MOMENT TO LOAD--

This is just a little very short game about a scientist who makes themselves some friends.

hint: if stuck... talk to the pile of grey junk... a few times :P

MADE FOR LUDUM DARE 42: Running out of space

CONTROLS:
Arrow keys/WASD to move & interact

USED:
Image to Bitsy by Ruin
Borksy by Ayolland 
Bitsy Hacks by Sean & Mildmojo
Hacked Bitsy Editor by JackTrick

MUSIC from the Youtube Audio Library:
Grind by Andrew Huang

SOUND EFFECTS  made in Beepbox
